name: Sigilyph
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.

attacks.name: Reflect
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.effect: Does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.
